main event: A UFO report was submitted on 10/8/52 documenting the sighting of an egg-shaped object emitting a blinking white light.
interesting points: The object was reported to have an elongated shape resembling an egg., The light emitted from the object blinked at 1-second intervals., The object was observed zigzagging initially before moving straight from North to South., The report was submitted by Capt. Gilbert F. Guttrich from Lowry AFB., The weather conditions during the sighting were clear with specific wind details provided.
sighted object: an egg-shaped, elongated object with a blinking white light
witness description: Capt. Gilbert F. Guttrich, Airdrome Officer
